text: in this footage a green military Jeep is
seen approaching a North Korean guard
post outside the Demilitarized Zone it's
being driven by a North Korean soldier
who is about to defect to South Korea
the soldier doesn't stop at the North
Korean guard post a guard can briefly be
seen running after the vehicle the
defector then goes deeper into the North
Korean side of the joint security area
and closer to the South Korean border
the joint security area is the only
point along the Demilitarized Zone where
troops from both North and South Korea
are stationed face-to-face it's located
in a so-called truce village where the
1953 armistice suspending the Korean War
was signed the last time a North Korean
defector crossed the demarcation line in
the joint security area was in 2007 the
defecting soldiers Jeep gets stuck close
to the border line
[Music]
then North Korean troops mobilize and
can be seen running to the scene with
guns drawn
[Music]
the defector jumps out of the car and
bolts towards the border while several
North Korean soldiers open fire from
behind one North Korean soldier shoots
from the ground another angle shows a
defector crossing a road on the South
Korean side while soldiers continue to
fire at him and one North Korean soldier
can be seen running after the defector
stopping in his tracks and quickly
turning back he briefly crosses the
border line which is a violation of the
1953 agreement between the two countries
the wounded defectors body lies about 55
yards south of the border line video
shows South Korean army sergeants
crawling to his body and then dragging
him to safety the defector is in a South
Korean hospital recovering from at least
five gunshot wounds
[Music]
